episodes.title: Sheep Freak
episodes.description: The dream chasers manage a challenging incursion by returning a doom sheep to the dream world, where they discover a dark force increasing in power.

episodes.title: Memory Chasers
episodes.description: After losing their memories, the dream chasers set out to find someone responsible for their predicament

episodes.title: Sound of Sirens
episodes.description: The disappearance of the Murky Realm causes a daytime incursion at school, and the team must use creative methods to send dangerous sirens back to the dream world.

episodes.title: Sick Beats
episodes.description: Logan disrupts the dream world with his music, while Mateo and Izzie investigate their father's new girlfriend in the real world.

episodes.title: Witchy Ways
episodes.description: The dream chasers, disobeying orders, sneak out of Castle Nocturnia to follow a raven to the Never Witch in hopes of retrieving their lost memories.

episodes.title: Toss and Turn
episodes.description: The dream chasers face difficulties maintaining focus and motivation during their first R.E.M. trial, which involves capturing a wild dream creature in a rodeo-style competition.

episodes.title: Romancing the Spear
episodes.description: In a past timeline, Oz's initial protégés, Beau and Hannah, confess their feelings for each other while on a mission to destroy the Nightmare King’s sword.

episodes.title: Beat the Clock
episodes.description: Zoey, trying to mend her relationship with her estranged father, finds herself distracted as the team prepares for their second R.E.M. trial, "Beat the Clock

episodes.title: Wake That Dreamer
episodes.description: As Mateo looks for his missing hourglass, his doppelganger, MadTeo, sneaks into Castle Nocturnia and wins over everyone just as the final trial nears.

episodes.title: Tale of Two Teos
episodes.description: Mateo and Zoey are captured by the Night Hunter and must free Z-Blob to rescue their friends at Castle Nocturnia from a terrible fate.

episodes.title: Adventures in Robot-Sitting
episodes.description: The Never Witch’s sudden assault forces the dream chasers to split up. While the main team rushes to the mysterious Dunes of Duralumina, Nova and Sneak are left behind to defend.

episodes.title: Personal Space Invaders
episodes.description: With the Never Witch on the loose, the dream chasers head to Oz and Albert’s landing to use Oz’s enchanted telescope. But what should have been?

episodes.title: Fistful of Doppelgangers
episodes.description: The Candy Realm is under siege, and the dream chasers are tasked with saving its sugary inhabitants. As they orchestrate a mass evacuation, Mateo and Astrid sneak into the Midnight Raven.

episodes.title: Irrational Treasure
episodes.description: The elusive Eye of Confusion has been located, but the dream chasers are not alone in their pursuit. With the Never Witch’s doppelgangers on their heels, the team embarks on a frantic treasure hunt.

episodes.title: Mission Implausible
episodes.description: As the Eye of Confusion’s power threatens to unravel reality, Logan and Astrid are forced to confront their deepest fears in the Dream Forge.

episodes.title: Grim Vengeance
episodes.description: The Never Witch’s ambitions have darkened, leading her to target the Grim Realm. In an unlikely alliance, the dream chasers must join forces with the Nightmare King and his grimspawn minions.

episodes.title: Crown Control
episodes.description: The dream chasers stumble upon the fabled Crown of Control with surprising ease, thanks to an unexpected encounter with the King of the Creatures.

episodes.title: The Promised Crown Affair
episodes.description: Izzie has vanished into the dream world, and the dream chasers struggle to maintain normalcy in the waking world while secretly searching for her.

episodes.title: Now or Never Witch
episodes.description: As the team battles this deadly foe, the Never Witch begins her ultimate spell, one that could unravel the very fabric of the dream world.

episodes.title: Never Forever
episodes.description: With the dream world on the brink of collapse, the dream chasers launch a risky plan to defeat the Never Witch
